ComicInfo.Summary:
Under the Dream Queen's thrall, Mary finally manages to break free and recover her short term memory. Outraged she's hauled away to toil in the palace kitchen making pies, where she finds her spellbound companions performing menial chores. Queen Amorpha seeks to separate her from any hope of restoring Mother Night forever. Meanwhile, Shroom and Oaken discover a key secret bringing Mary the means to fight the Queen's magic.
Note: The digital edition (7/16/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
